title: Oil Rises as Iran Conducts Naval Drills Before Talks With US
description: Oil advanced from Friday’s close after Iran carried out naval drills near a major regional transit chokepoint before talks with the US are set to resume later Tuesday.
content: Oil advanced from Friday’s close after Iran carried out naval drills near a major regional transit chokepoint before talks with the US are set to resume later Tuesday.
